content: **crocheted sugar cane/christmas decoration in drops muskat piece is worked in a spiral with treble crochets theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #dropsholidaytreat drops design pattern r-855 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** spiral measures approx width = 2 cm length = approx 19 cm sugar cane measure approx 15 cm vertically fully assembled **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 08 off white 50 g colour 12 red 1 sugar cane weighs approx 12 g **accessories** paper clip or wire to shape the sugar cane drops glitter or optional strand for loop **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 3 mm **crochet gauge** 22 treble crochets in width and 11 row vertically on hook size 3 mm = 10 x 10 cm note remember that hook size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger hook if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller hook
